statements: SELECT count(*) FROM customer USE INDEX(cust_lastName_firstName_customerId) WHERE lastName IS NOT MISSING
SELECT count(*) FROM customer USE INDEX(cust_customerId_lastName_firstName) WHERE customerId IS NOT MISSING
UPDATE STATISTICS FOR customer(lastName, firstName, customerId, type)
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase USE INDEX(purch_customerId_purchaseId) WHERE customerId IS NOT MISSING
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase USE INDEX(purch_arrProduct_customerId) WHERE ANY v IN lineItems SATISFIES v.product IS NOT MISSING END
UPDATE STATISTICS FOR purchase(customerId, purchaseId, type, DISTINCT ARRAY pd.product FOR pd IN lineItems END)
SELECT count(*) FROM product USE INDEX(prod_productId) WHERE productId IS NOT MISSING
SELECT count(*) FROM shellTest USE INDEX(st_source_idx) WHERE c11 IS NOT MISSING
SELECT count(*) FROM shellTest USE INDEX(st_target_idx) WHERE c21 IS NOT MISSING
UPDATE STATISTICS FOR shellTest INDEX(st_source_idx, st_target_idx)
